languages.text: {n}Маражай растекается в довольной улыбке и еще выше поднимает голову.{/n} "Хм. Возможно, из тебя все же когда-нибудь выйдет толк. Надеюсь, ты запомнишь мое снисхождение к твоим слабостям... и будешь стараться соответственно".

{n}Marazhai smiles contentedly and raises his head even higher.{/n} "Hmm. You may one day be worth something after all. I trust that you will remember my leniency toward your weaknesses... and increase your efforts accordingly."
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай растекается в довольной улыбке и еще выше поднимает голову.{/n} "Хм. Возможно, из тебя все же когда-нибудь выйдет толк. Надеюсь, ты запомнишь мое снисхождение к твоим слабостям... и будешь стараться соответственно".

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai smiles contentedly and raises his head even higher.{/n} "Hm. Perhaps you might one day be worth something after all. I trust you'll remember my leniency regarding your weaknesses... And will make the corresponding efforts."

{n}Marazhai smiles contentedly and raises his head even higher.{/n} "Hm. Perhaps you might one day be worth something after all. I trust you'll remember my leniency regarding your weaknesses... And will make the corresponding efforts."

{n}Marazhai smiles contentedly and raises his head even higher.{/n} "Hmm. You may one day be worth something after all. I trust that you will remember my leniency toward your weaknesses... and make the increase your efforts accordingly."

{n}Marazhai smiles contentedly and raises his head even higher.{/n} "Hmm. You may one day be worth something after all. I trust that you will remember my leniency toward your weaknesses... and increase your efforts accordingly."

languages.text: {n}Marazhai sonríe satisfecho y levanta la barbilla aún más.{/n} «Hum. Quizá un día valgas para algo. Confío en que no olvides la indulgencia que he mostrado con tu debilidad... y en que redobles tus esfuerzos para compensarla».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai smiles contentedly and raises his head even higher.{/n} "Hmm. You may one day be worth something after all. I trust that you will remember my leniency toward your weaknesses... and increase your efforts accordingly."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai sonríe satisfecho y levanta la barbilla aún más.{/n} «Hum. Quizá un día valgas para algo. Confío en que no olvides la indulgencia que he mostrado con tu debilidad... y en que redobles tus esfuerzos para compensarla».

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋满意地笑了起来，把头昂得更高了。{/n}“嗯，或许有朝一日，你会派上些用场。我相信，你会记住我仁慈地宽容了你的软弱……也相信你会为此更加努力。”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai smiles contentedly and raises his head even higher.{/n} "Hmm. You may one day be worth something after all. I trust that you will remember my leniency toward your weaknesses... and increase your efforts accordingly."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋满意地笑了起来，把头昂得更高了。{/n}“嗯嗯，或许有朝一日，你会派上些用场。我相信，你会记住我仁慈地宽容了你的软弱……你会为此做出相应的努力。”
{n}玛拉斋满意地笑了起来，把头昂得更高了。{/n}“嗯，或许有朝一日，你会派上些用场。我相信，你会记住我仁慈地宽容了你的软弱……也相信你会为此更加努力。”

languages.text: {n}Marazhai sourit d'un air satisfait et lève la tête un peu plus.{/n} « Hmm... Un jour, vous vaudrez peut-être quelque chose, finalement. J'espère que vous vous souviendrez de ma clémence vis-à-vis de vos faiblesses... et que vous fournirez les efforts nécessaires. »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai smiles contentedly and raises his head even higher.{/n} "Hmm. You may one day be worth something after all. I trust that you will remember my leniency toward your weaknesses... and increase your efforts accordingly."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai sourit d'un air satisfait et lève la tête un peu plus.{/n} « Hmm... Un jour, vous vaudrez peut-être quelque chose, finalement. J'espère que vous vous souviendrez de ma clémence vis-à-vis de vos faiblesses... et que vous fournirez les efforts nécessaires. »

languages.text: {n}マラズハイは満足そうに微笑み、さらに頭を高く上げた。{/n}「ふん、結局のところ、お前にはいつか価値がつくかもしれない。お前の弱さに関して俺が寛大であることを忘れないでもらいたいな…そうして、それに見合った努力をすることもな」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai smiles contentedly and raises his head even higher.{/n} "Hmm. You may one day be worth something after all. I trust that you will remember my leniency toward your weaknesses... and increase your efforts accordingly."

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイは満足そうに微笑み、さらに頭を高く上げた。{/n}「ふん、結局のところ、お前にはいつか価値がつくかもしれない。お前の弱さに関して俺が寛大であることを忘れないでもらいたいな…そうして、それに見合った努力をすることもな」

languages.text: {n}Marazhai lächelt zufrieden und reckt seinen Kopf noch höher.{/n} "Hmm. Eines Tages werdet Ihr vielleicht doch etwas wert sein. Ich baue darauf, dass Ihr Euch an meine Milde hinsichtlich Eurer Schwäche erinnern werdet ... und Eure Bemühungen entsprechend verstärkt."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai smiles contentedly and raises his head even higher.{/n} "Hmm. You may one day be worth something after all. I trust that you will remember my leniency toward your weaknesses... and increase your efforts accordingly."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai lächelt zufrieden und reckt seinen Kopf noch höher.{/n} "Hm. Vielleicht werdet Ihr eines Tages doch etwas wert sein. Ich vertraue darauf, dass Ihr meine Gnade hinsichtlich Eurer Schwäche nicht vergessen werdet ... Und entsprechende Bemühungen unternehmt."

{n}Marazhai lächelt zufrieden und reckt seinen Kopf noch höher.{/n} "Hmm. Eines Tages werdet Ihr vielleicht doch etwas wert sein. Ich baue darauf, dass Ihr Euch an meine Milde hinsichtlich Eurer Schwäche erinnern werdet ... und Eure Bemühungen entsprechend verstärkt."

languages.text: {n}Marazhai, memnun bir şekilde gülümseyerek başını daha da yukarı kaldırıyor.{/n} "Hımm... Her şeye rağmen belki bir gün bir değerin olur. Zayıflığına karşı müsamaha gösterdiğimi unutmayacağını ve... Çabalarını buna göre artıracağını umuyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai smiles contentedly and raises his head even higher.{/n} "Hmm. You may one day be worth something after all. I trust that you will remember my leniency toward your weaknesses... and increase your efforts accordingly."
